testcase.name: Enter a valid vehicle registration number and get the make and colour of vehicle
testcase.system-out: Given I am on the DVLAs Vehicles Information Page...........................passed And I proceed with checking specific details of vehicles as below:..........passed When I search with a "valid vehicleRegNumber" and click to continue.........passed Then I should be able to see the "vehicle make" and the "vehicle colour" displayed.passed

testcase.name: Enter an invalid vehicle registration number and receive an error message
testcase.system-out: Given I am on the DVLAs Vehicles Information Page...........................passed And I proceed with checking specific details of vehicles as below:..........passed When I enter an "invalid vehicleRegNumber" on the searchField and click to continue.passed Then I should be able to see an "error message" displayed for invalid registration number.passed

testcase.name: Enter a wrong vehicle registration number and receive an error page with an error message
testcase.system-out: Given I am on the DVLAs Vehicles Information Page...........................passed And I proceed with checking specific details of vehicles as below:..........passed When I enter a "wrongVehicle regNumber" on the searchField..................passed And I click on the continue button..........................................passed Then I should be navigated to an error page with "detailsNotFound error"....passed
